refnamediv.refpurpose: This function upsamples a vector interleaving given values or copies of the vector elements.

refsynopsisdiv.title: Calling Sequence
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: y = upsamplefill (x, w) y = upsamplefill (x, w, cpy)

listitem.para: scalar, vector or matrix of real or complex numbers
scalar or vector of real or complex values
can take in "true" or "false", default is false

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: This is an Octave function. This function upsamples a vector interleaving given values or copies of the vector elements. The second argument has the values in the vector w that are placed in between the elements of x. The third argument, if true, means that w should be scalar and that each value in x repeated w times.
